languages.text: Также в ходе битвы была уничтожена некая загадочная установка. Как выяснилось при осмотре, именно она отвечала за создание магнитных бурь над планетой, скрывавших гробницу от посторонних глаз. Ее дух машины угас навеки, однако ваши техножрецы смогли извлечь те ее мощи, что еще представляли какую-либо ценность.

traits.locale_text: Также в ходе битвы была уничтожена некая загадочная установка. Как выяснилось при осмотре, именно она отвечала за создание магнитных бурь над планетой, скрывавших гробницу от посторонних глаз. Ее дух машины угас навеки, однако ваши техножрецы смогли извлечь те ее мощи, что еще представляли какую-либо ценность.

languages.text: In addition, a curious machine was destroyed during the battle. As further inspection would show, this was the very contraption responsible for creating the magnetic storms blanketing the planet, concealing the cemetery from prying eyes. Its machine spirit extinguished forever, Tech-Priests still managed to extract those parts that still held value.
languages.original_text: Также в ходе битвы была уничтожена некая загадочная установка. Как выяснилось при осмотре, именно она отвечала за создание магнитных бурь над планетой, скрывавших гробницу от посторонних глаз. Ее дух машины угас навеки, однако ваши техножрецы смогли извлечь те ее мощи, что еще представляли какую-либо ценность.

traits.locale_text: In addition, a curious machine was destroyed during the battle. As an inspection would show, this was the very contraption responsible for creating the magnetic storms blanketing the planet, concealing the cemetery from prying eyes. Its machine spirit extinguished forever, Tech-Priests still managed to extract from it those parts that still had value.

In addition, a curious machine was destroyed during the battle. As an inspection would show, this was the very contraption responsible for creating the magnetic storms blanketing the planet, concealing the cemetery from prying eyes. Its machine spirit extinguished forever, Tech-Priests still managed to extract from it those parts that still had value.

In addition, a curious machine was destroyed during the battle. As further inspection would show, this was the very contraption responsible for creating the magnetic storms blanketing the planet, concealing the cemetery from prying eyes. Its machine spirit extinguished forever, Tech-Priests still managed to extract those parts that still held value.

In addition, a curious machine was destroyed during the battle. As further inspection would show, this was the very contraption responsible for creating the magnetic storms blanketing the planet, concealing the cemetery from prying eyes. Its machine spirit extinguished forever, Tech-Priests still managed to extract those parts that still held value.

In addition, a curious machine was destroyed during the battle. As further inspection would show, this was the very contraption responsible for creating the magnetic storms blanketing the planet, concealing the cemetery from prying eyes. Its machine spirit extinguished forever, Tech-Priests still managed to extract those parts that still held value.

languages.text: 此外，某台奇怪的机器在战斗中被摧毁。进一步的调查表明，正是这台机器制造了覆盖整颗行星的磁暴，阻止外面的人发现这座地下基地。那台机器的机魂已经永远消失了，但技术神甫仍然成功提取了其中仍有价值的零件。
languages.original_text: In addition, a curious machine was destroyed during the battle. As further inspection would show, this was the very contraption responsible for creating the magnetic storms blanketing the planet, concealing the cemetery from prying eyes. Its machine spirit extinguished forever, Tech-Priests still managed to extract those parts that still held value.

traits.locale_text: 此外，某台奇怪的机器在战斗中被摧毁。进一步的调查表明，正是这台机器制造了覆盖整颗行星的磁暴，阻止外面的人发现这座地下基地。那台机器的机魂已经永远消失了，但技术祭司仍然成功提取了其中仍有价值的零件。

languages.text: 加えて、奇妙な機械が戦闘中に破壊された。さらに調べればわかることだが、これは惑星を覆う磁気嵐を発生させ、墓地を詮索好きな目から隠す役割を担った装置であった。機械精霊は永遠に消え去ってしまったが、技術司祭たちは使うことのできる部品を取り出していた。
languages.original_text: In addition, a curious machine was destroyed during the battle. As further inspection would show, this was the very contraption responsible for creating the magnetic storms blanketing the planet, concealing the cemetery from prying eyes. Its machine spirit extinguished forever, Tech-Priests still managed to extract those parts that still held value.

traits.locale_text: 加えて、奇妙な機械が戦闘中に破壊された。さらに調べればわかることだが、これは惑星を覆う磁気嵐を発生させ、墓地を詮索好きな目から隠す役割を担った装置であった。機械精霊は永遠に消え去ってしまったが、技術司祭たちは使うことのできる部品を取り出していた。

languages.text: Además, durante la batalla se destruyó una curiosa máquina. Como demostraría una inspección más detallada, se trataba del artilugio responsable de crear las tormentas magnéticas que cubrían el planeta, ocultando el cementerio de miradas indiscretas. Aunque el espíritu máquina se extinguió para siempre, los tecnosacerdotes consiguieron extraer las piezas que aún tenían valor.
languages.original_text: In addition, a curious machine was destroyed during the battle. As further inspection would show, this was the very contraption responsible for creating the magnetic storms blanketing the planet, concealing the cemetery from prying eyes. Its machine spirit extinguished forever, Tech-Priests still managed to extract those parts that still held value.

traits.locale_text: Además, durante la batalla se destruyó una curiosa máquina. Como demostraría una inspección más detallada, se trataba del artilugio responsable de crear las tormentas magnéticas que cubrían el planeta, ocultando el cementerio de miradas indiscretas. Aunque el espíritu máquina se extinguió para siempre, los tecnosacerdotes consiguieron extraer las piezas que aún tenían valor.

languages.text: Darüber hinaus wurde während des Kampfs eine sonderbare Maschine zerstört. Wie spätere Untersuchungen zeigten, handelte es sich dabei um das Gerät, das die magnetischen Stürme auf dem Planeten erzeugte, um den Friedhof vor neugierigen Augen zu schützen. Der Maschinengeist dieser Maschine war für immer erloschen, doch es gelang den Techpriestern, die Teile zu bergen, die noch von Wert waren.
languages.original_text: In addition, a curious machine was destroyed during the battle. As further inspection would show, this was the very contraption responsible for creating the magnetic storms blanketing the planet, concealing the cemetery from prying eyes. Its machine spirit extinguished forever, Tech-Priests still managed to extract those parts that still held value.

traits.locale_text: Darüber hinaus wurde während des Kampfs eine sonderbare Maschine zerstört. Wie spätere Untersuchungen zeigten, handelte es sich dabei um das Gerät, das die magnetischen Stürme auf dem Planeten erzeugte, um den Friedhof vor neugierigen Augen zu schützen. Der Maschinengeist dieser Maschine war für immer erloschen, doch es gelang den Techpriestern, die Teile zu bergen, die noch von Wert waren.

languages.text: Par ailleurs, une étrange machine a été détruite pendant l'échauffourée. Comme l'inspection le montre par la suite, il s'agissait de l'engin responsable des orages magnétiques enveloppant la planète et dissimulant le cimetière aux regards des curieux. Si son esprit de la machine s'est éteint à jamais, les technoprêtres réussissent tout de même à en récupérer les pièces encore exploitables.
languages.original_text: In addition, a curious machine was destroyed during the battle. As further inspection would show, this was the very contraption responsible for creating the magnetic storms blanketing the planet, concealing the cemetery from prying eyes. Its machine spirit extinguished forever, Tech-Priests still managed to extract those parts that still held value.

traits.locale_text: Par ailleurs, une étrange machine a été détruite pendant l'échauffourée. Comme l'inspection le montre par la suite, il s'agissait de l'engin responsable des orages magnétiques enveloppant la planète et dissimulant le cimetière aux regards des curieux. Si son esprit de la machine s'est éteint à jamais, les technoprêtres réussissent tout de même à en récupérer les pièces encore exploitables.

languages.text: Ayrıca çatışmada acayip bir makine de yok edildi. Daha sonraki incelemelerde bu makinenin gezegeni sarıp mezarlığı meraklı gözlerden saklatan manyetik fırtınaları yarattığı ortaya çıktı. Makine ruhu ebediyen karanlığa gömülmüş olsa da Tekno Rahipler buna rağmen değerini kaybetmemiş parçalarını çıkarmayı başardı.
languages.original_text: In addition, a curious machine was destroyed during the battle. As further inspection would show, this was the very contraption responsible for creating the magnetic storms blanketing the planet, concealing the cemetery from prying eyes. Its machine spirit extinguished forever, Tech-Priests still managed to extract those parts that still held value.
